The caster uses their [[sand]] to create gigantic hands or claws, which can be used for multiple purposes including crushing, capturing or restraining enemies and other targets. The brilliance of this technique is in the strength and sheer size of the constructs which rivals that of a [[tailed beast]]. Once the arms lock onto its target, it is near impossible to break free, and one must resort to other methods. This technique was powerful enough to completely halt the [[Demonic Statue of the Outer Path]]'s [[Demonic Statue Chains|chains]]. 

Shinki’s usage of this technique incorporates [[Iron Sand]], which he uses to surround his hand to strengthen his punches,<ref>''Boruto'' episode 60</ref> or attach to more Iron Sand to act as arms, that can deliver a barrage of punches.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 59</ref>

==Trivia==
* In the [[Naruto: Shippūden|anime]], this technique was used by Gaara's sand ghost before its proper début.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 186</ref>
